info.name: Dark Deezer
info.description: Darker style for deezer.com Report issues on GitHub: https://github.com/Xseba360/deezer-dark-style
info.additionalInfo:
Last Update: 02.06.2018 1.7.1 - 02.06.2018
  • - Unstyled popover arrows fix
1.7 - 31.05.2018
  • - Fixed datagrid header background colour
  • - Adjusted buttons for new (obfuscated?) class names.
  • - Fixed dropdown colours
  • - Minor changes
1.6.1 - 13.05.2018
  • - Small fix for search results and Firefox fix
1.6 - 06.05.2018
  • - Updated for Deezer layout changes (artist page and popovers)
1.5 - 21.04.2018
  • - Updated for Deezer layout change on main page.
  • - Fixed popularity meter. Thanks to ShabaDaba for noticing.
1.4 - 06.12.2017
  • - Updated for newest Deezer changes.
  • - Basic style for support.deezer.com
1.3 - 17.11.2017
  • - Minor fixes to adjust to newest Deezer changes.
1.2 - 17.08.2017
  • - Fixed background color in the search view.
  • - Updated settings menu.
1.1 - 08.08.2017
  • - Updated for latest Deezer changes.
  • - Fixed share dialog.

data.title: New layout needs improvement to make it great again
